parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds multiple magazines to the unit. For cargo containers use [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addMagazines''' [magazineName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - a soldier

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - Number of magazines.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addMagazines]] ["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag", 3];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]]
</value></part></template></root>
